Key Match Events: Julián Álvarez scored the first goal for Argentina in the 22nd minute.
Lionel Messi scored the second goal for Argentina in the 51st minute.
Argentina beat Canada 2-0 to reach the final of the Copa América.
Post-Match Reflections: Messi commented that only God knows when he will retire.
Moreno noted that Messi looked healthier in Argentina's win against Canada.
Discussion on why Alphonso Davies struggled in the Copa América.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at MetLife Stadium in New Jersey.
